content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. Let's start the negotiation for the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I would like to suggest a price of 1000 Euro per month for the apartment. It is a fair price considering the location and the facilities.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low offer, considering the quality of the apartment. I suggest 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the current market situation and the condition of the apartment, 1050 Euro per month is the highest I can offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for the apartment's quality and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, then I offer 1050 Euro per month for the unfurnished apartment. However, I can provide you with some furniture at an additional cost.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [repeat] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not talking about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize for the confusion. I offer 1050 Euro per month for the unfurnished apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a better offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more. I suggest 1600 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your viewpoint, but considering the market situation and the condition of the apartment, 1200 Euro per month is the highest I can offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for the apartment's quality and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
